sn6.10:1.2: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho kokaliko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn6.10:1.3: “papiccha, bhante, sariputtamoggallana papikanam icchanam vasam gata”ti.
sn6.10:1.4: Evam vutte, bhagava kokalikam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn6.10:1.5: “ma hevam, kokalika, avaca; ma hevam, kokalika, avaca.
sn6.10:1.6: Pasadehi, kokalika, sariputtamoggallanesu cittam. Pesala sariputtamoggallana”ti.
sn6.10:1.7: Dutiyampi kho kokaliko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn6.10:1.8: “kincapi me, bhante, bhagava saddhayiko paccayiko; atha kho papicchava bhante, sariputtamoggallana papikanam icchanam vasam gata”ti.
sn6.10:1.9: Dutiyampi kho bhagava kokalikam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn6.10:1.10: “ma hevam, kokalika, avaca; ma hevam, kokalika, avaca.
sn6.10:1.11: Pasadehi, kokalika, sariputtamoggallanesu cittam. Pesala sariputtamoggallana”ti.
sn6.10:1.12: Tatiyampi kho kokaliko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn6.10:1.14: Tatiyampi kho bhagava kokalikam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn6.10:2.1: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn6.10:2.2: Acirapakkantassa ca kokalikassa bhikkhuno sasapamattihi pilakahi sabbo kayo phuto ahosi.
sn6.10:2.3: Sasapamattiyo hutva muggamattiyo ahesum, muggamattiyo hutva kalayamattiyo ahesum, kalayamattiyo hutva kolatthimattiyo ahesum, kolatthimattiyo hutva kolamattiyo ahesum, kolamattiyo hutva amalakamattiyo ahesum, amalakamattiyo hutva beluvasalatukamattiyo ahesum, beluvasalatukamattiyo hutva billamattiyo ahesum, billamattiyo hutva pabhijjimsu. Pubbanca lohitanca paggharimsu.
sn6.10:2.4: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu teneva abadhena kalamakasi.
sn6.10:2.5: Kalankato ca kokaliko bhikkhu padumam nirayam upapajji sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva.
sn6.10:3.1: Atha kho brahma sahampati abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho brahma sahampati bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn6.10:3.3: Kalankato ca, bhante, kokaliko bhikkhu padumam nirayam upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva”ti.
sn6.10:3.5: Idam vatva bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
sn6.10:4.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
sn6.10:4.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim brahma sahampati abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho, bhikkhave, brahma sahampati mam etadavoca:
sn6.10:4.4: Kalankato ca, bhante, kokaliko bhikkhu padumam nirayam upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva’ti.
sn6.10:4.5: Idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahma sahampati, idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi”ti.
sn6.10:5.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn6.10:5.2: “kivadigham nu kho, bhante, padume niraye ayuppamanan”ti?
sn6.10:5.5: ‘ettakani vassani iti va, ettakani vassasatani iti va, ettakani vassasahassani iti va, ettakani vassasatasahassani iti va’”ti.
sn6.10:6.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhu visatikhariko kosalako tilavaho. Tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekam tilam uddhareyya;
sn6.10:6.2: khippataram kho so, bhikkhu, visatikhariko kosalako tilavaho imina upakkamena parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo.
sn6.10:6.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati abbuda niraya, evameko nirabbudanirayo.
sn6.10:6.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati nirabbuda niraya, evameko ababo nirayo.
sn6.10:6.5: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati ababa niraya, evameko atato nirayo.
sn6.10:6.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati atata niraya, evameko ahaho nirayo.
sn6.10:6.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati ahaha niraya, evameko kumudo nirayo.
sn6.10:6.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati kumuda niraya, evameko sogandhiko nirayo.
sn6.10:6.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati sogandhika niraya, evameko uppalanirayo.
sn6.10:6.10: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati uppala niraya, evameko pundariko nirayo.
sn6.10:6.11: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati pundarika niraya, evameko padumo nirayo.
sn6.10:6.12: Padume pana, bhikkhu, niraye kokaliko bhikkhu upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva”ti.
sn6.10:6.14: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
sn6.10:11.2: Bako ca brahma apara ca ditthi;
sn6.10:11.4: Turu ca brahma aparo ca kokalikoti.
